title: Council Decision of 23 July 1996 appointing the members and alternates of the Advisory Committee on Pharmaceutical Training
header:
COUNCIL DECISION
of 23 July  1996
appointing the members and alternates of the Advisory Committee on Pharmaceutical  Training
(96/C  239/02)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
main_body:
The following are hereby appointed as members and alternates of  the Advisory Committee on Pharmaceutical Training for the period from 23 July 1996 to 22 July  1999:
A. >TABLE>
B. >TABLE>
C. >TABLE>
attachments:
Done at Brussels,  23 July 1996.
For the Council
The President
I. YATES
(1) OJ No L 253, 24. 9. 1985, p. 43.
(2) OJ No C 208, 15. 8. 1992, p. 2.
(3) OJ No C 300, 17. 11. 1992, p. 3.
